text:
Hi everyone!
Does anyone knows how to crate a functionality like the one <http://Monday.com|Monday.com> has on their homepage?

The idea would be to put products into the boxes and when the user selects it, a check mark will be activated.  After clicking in "get in touch" or "get information" A form will be open and the person will give us their corporate email and names.
Hi, please could anybody assist with some website coding for visuals? I need to edit some hard coded graphics

Very cool organization, you might have better luck posting in the <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> channel, it's a little more job oriented and the people looking for jobs usually watch the messages in there more closely.
+1 I'm looking for a solution to this as well.
<@U03NWU3ED3J> <@U024FMZ6ZUY> any luck with this?

Hello! I received the below question ab out the Website Grader form  from one of my partners and I'm hoping someone can provide a little guidance or next steps. Appreciate any feedback. Thanks in advance!

"*We are trying to implement the partner tool Website Grader Form onto a HubSpot landing page, but are having some issues. HubSpot provided the custom script for the form, but I can't figure out how to edit the source code of a form module.*

*We have the form built in our forms environment, it's set to raw HTML and the form ID matches what we have in our custom code. I'm just not sure how to implement onto an actual landing page. I tried HubSpot support but it's not really getting anywhere. Would you be able to assist? Not sure if this helps but here is the code we were provided:*

`<script type="application/json" id="HubSpot-grader-form-customization">{"logo":"<https://22018682.fs1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/22018682/Website-Grader/1666796737045-bullblack.png>","resultLogo":"<https://22018682.fs1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/22018682/Website-Grader/1666796743718-yellowbull.png>","title":"BS LLC Website Grader","subtitle":"Grade your website in seconds. Then learn how to improve it for free.","thankYouMessage":"Thank you for submitting the form! <a class=\"HubSpot-grader-form-view-result\" href=\"#\">Click here</a> to view your grade result. You can also <a class=\"HubSpot-grader-form-reset-form\" href=\"#\">grade another website</a>.","headerLinks":[],"footerLinks":[],"language":"","sidepanelCta":{"show":true,"url":"<http://bsllc.biz/>","agency":"BS LLC "},"submitButton":{"backgroundColor":"#e4e555","textColor":"#3c3936"},"resultGradient":null}</script><script async id="HubSpot-grader-form" src="<https://widget.grader.com/grader-form-script/production/grader-form.min.js?version=1666796405018>" data-form="ebe6606c-89bb-47cf-9b56-414351174df0" data-portal="22018682" data-key="PpA0NijsUirIJj-gv2wiH8AvyZosbYjISEHg3SD1kJRWYQEtrVD98HaCWcRXOvSiYfIV-0-rl0AtFITUWFnTw25gAgAnpMh1PMzPTfkvLQ7my6JVXbLHoV2jmNMUY8tjioccqBDnkN2XxbWo9pnRA7RX64SASSzgbaTUIMnCLN5zBg2ZCDLxKmK_uAdzGG2vEeqznoGT8AUPHqz26iUGGYfysSs6urffiNg4P8_sfVL1Xn3qS7C7qAYxqT45cphC0N2Bo0k7auqJWpK9WvRUHncFO8cDMLrsZutuBUhchcZm4gH14wPNFA.rfKY5q6OpA5iN3Q859kqIw.Mgvdl5dPA5uyOLGD"></script>`
Hey <@U0216HFE14H>, have you found a solution to this problem?
Slack basically killed my private messages (I’m sure I did this by clicking on something that I didn’t read), and I have no clue who has reached out to me and that I was helping.
Anyone know what I’m talking about here and know how to reverse it?
I'll look into it Nick... but really not sure what may have happened here!

<https://share.getcloudapp.com/kpuO0rkK>

Show and sort as an option
Looks like I agreed to make my sidebar “less busy” and all it did was hide ongoing conversations
It was set to unread only via the new update I agreed to on bothmy Starred and channels
so that was fun
dang. but you're all set now?
`Preferences -> Sidebar -> Show all your conversations`
I've already upvoted the ideia! This is crucial for a robust integration of Cookie Consent!

I'm on my client's new portal and created a blog post template with all the usual fields, and it seems they can add modules vertically to the `{{ content.post_body }}`  area? Did I miss a product update? This is kinda exciting.
there is a private beta, maybe they opted in?
I also had a question from an agency working on a client blog today that was really similar, so maybe it's out of private beta...
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Drag-amp-Drop-functionality-for-Blog-Posts/idi-p/408909>
Ah cool, I'm not sure they would have known to opt into the beta so maybe it's out of beta or was added to their portal accidentally
I also had that same issue
Don't know what triggered it
clicking all fixed the issue
THANK YOU SO MUCH!!
of course
<@U012PBG90SZ> I realized this might be the case but not being a developer I was hoping for more direction. I was able to accomplish same task using CTAs instead of a branching form... for now.

Good morning team, I hope you are doing well.
Once we sent an Marketing email to a contact trough a WF, is there any possibility to find our via API using Custom Code if the delivery event has experienced any issue like
• Email to this recipient has previously bounced
• Previously unsubscribed from all subscription types
